uvi.product_version: versions from v3.5 to before v5.4.151
uvi.description:
ipack: ipoctal: fix stack information leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.151 by commit 8657158a3b68c85234e6da3d8eae33d6183588b7, it was introduced in version v3.5 by commit ba4dc61fe8c545a5d6a68b63616776556b771f51. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ipack: ipoctal: fix stack information leak
